title: The Trials and Tribulations of Lily Tripitaka
description: Lily Tripitaka is a typical kid who lives in a typical London suburb and goes to a typical school. And she can tell you it’s a JUNGLE OUT THERE!Fights, jealousies, exams, mischief and misfortune - Lily faces the usual stuff every kid has to contend with at school, with her gang of friends.However things take a turn for the worse when her mum is diagnosed with cancer and a New Girl arrives. Losing her friends and the prospect of her mum dying threatens to take away everything that Lily holds dear.A rollercoaster ride of a story where basic Buddhist values are brought to life and through Lily’s misadventures, we learn about attachment, karma, mindfulness, why we feel this way and what we can do about it. It is ultimately a story about love, kindness and what it means to be human.
author: M.L. Dempster
